FuncDef: This command creates a Service Access Point (SAP) within a service. A SAP is a combination of port and encapsulation parameters which identifies the service access point on the interface and within the device. Each SAP must be unique.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP.
Removes the association of a SAP or a spoke SDP with an explicit endpoint name.
Keyword used to create a SAP instance. The create keyword requirement can be enabled/disabled in the environment>create context.
